name: Door Search
description:
A/D or arrow keys to move

S, space, or down, to open a door

W or up to jump

Find the door to the next level

Each door is connected to another door.

Avoid the green zombies or you would have to start the level over.

Game created for game jam: https://itch.io/jam/101

Warning: The music is very annoying. Make sure to mute it.
